alert.note: Alert for Bee; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:06PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern La Salle, northern McMullen, southwestern Goliad, northern Live Oak and northern Bee Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 506 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Runge to near Campbellton to near Goldfinch. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beeville, Three Rivers, Tilden, Choke Canyon, Mineral, Berclair, Cross, Fowlerton, Calliham, Nell, Tulsita, Zella, Karon, Normanna, Oakville, Pettus, Crowther, Pawnee, Simmons and Ray Point. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 58 and 83. US Highway 281 between mile markers 618 and 630. US Highway 181 between mile markers 572 and 594. US Highway 59 between mile markers 678 and 700. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bee; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen
